SEARCH
Package org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.controller

Class ReviewController

java.lang.Object
org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.controller.ReviewController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/reviews") public class ReviewController extends Object
Manages RESTful API endpoints for Review-related CRUD operations. The ReviewController class maps to the /reviews URI and provides endpoints for creating, updating, and querying reviews. It interacts with the ReviewService to perform these operations, maintaining a clean separation of concerns. It is designed to return appropriate HTTP status codes and messages for each operation.
See Also:

  • ReviewDTO

  • Constructor Details

    • ReviewController

      @Autowired public ReviewController(ReviewService reviewService)

  • Method Details

    • createReview

      @PostMapping("/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createReview(@RequestBody ReviewDTO reviewDTO)
      Creates a new review. This endpoint maps to a POST request at /reviews/create and is responsible for creating a new review based on the provided ReviewDTO. Errors that occur during the creation process are handled by the ReviewService.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - a Data Transfer Object containing review details, required
      Returns:
      the review that was created with its associated information
      See Also:
      • ReviewService.createReview(ReviewDTO)

    • updateReviewStatus

      @PostMapping("/admin/update-status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateReviewStatus(@RequestBody AdminReviewAction adminReviewAction)
      Updates a review's status based on admin action. This endpoint maps to a POST request at /reviews/admin/update-status and is designed for admin users to update the status of a review. Errors that occur during the update process are handled by the ReviewService.
      Parameters:
      adminReviewAction - a Data Transfer Object containing the admin action and the review ID, required
      Returns:
      the review that was updated with its associated information
      See Also:
      • ReviewService.updateReviewStatus(AdminReviewAction)

    • getPendingReviews

      @GetMapping("/admin/pending") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPendingReviews()
      Retrieves all reviews pending admin approval. This endpoint maps to a GET request at /reviews/admin/pending and utilizes the ReviewService to fetch all reviews that are pending approval. Errors that occur during the retrieval process are handled by the ReviewService.
      Returns:
      a list of reviews that have a PENDING status
      See Also:
      • ReviewService.getPendingReviews()

    • getApprovedReviews

      @GetMapping("/{restaurantId}/approved") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getApprovedReviews(@PathVariable Long restaurantId)
      Fetches all approved reviews for a specific restaurant. This endpoint maps to a GET request at /reviews/{restaurantId}/approved and utilizes the ReviewService to fetch all reviews that have been approved for a particular restaurant. Errors that occur during the retrieval process are handled by the ReviewService.
      Parameters:
      restaurantId - the unique ID of the restaurant, required
      Returns:
      a list of approved reviews for the specified restaurant
      See Also:
      • ReviewService.getApprovedReviews(Long)
